scripts.build: concurrently "cd todocli && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.clean: concurrently "rimraf node_modules" "cd todocli && rimraf node_modules build" "cd server && rimraf node_modules build"
scripts.install: (cd todocli && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd todocli && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start"
